忠义量谱

开启<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>钢铁信念<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能后，画面上会出现显示该技能使用状态的量谱。
想要集中仇恨时，建议使用钢铁信念。
<UIForeground>F201FA</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FB</UIGlow>职业量谱的说明可以随时在技能菜单中进行查看。<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
忠义量谱

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>忠义精通<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>特性后，画面上会出现专用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>忠义量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>。
该量谱不仅会显示钢铁信念的状态，还会显示骑士的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>忠义<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>效果的具体量值。
自动攻击命中时会积累忠义量值，消耗忠义量值可以发动<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>盾阵<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>、45级学会的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>保护<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>和62级学会的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>干预<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能。
兽魂量谱

开启<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>守护<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能后，画面上会出现显示该技能使用状态的量谱。
想要集中仇恨时，建议使用守护。
兽魂量谱

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>兽魂<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>特性后，画面上会出现专用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>兽魂量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>。
该量谱不仅会显示守护的状态，还会显示代表战士心中野性的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>兽魂<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>的具体量值。
<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>原初之魂<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>和45级学会的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>钢铁旋风<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>等技能都需要通过消耗积累的兽魂量值才能发动。
兽魂量值可以通过发动特定的技能进行积累。
暗血量谱

开启<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>深恶痛绝<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能后，画面上会出现显示该技能使用状态的量谱。
想要集中仇恨时，建议使用深恶痛绝。
暗黑量谱

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>暗黑波动<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能后，画面上会出现专用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>暗黑量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>。
暗黑量谱会显示<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>暗黑<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>的持续时间。使用<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>暗黑波动<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>和40级学会的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>暗黑锋<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>可以附加暗黑状态。
暗黑状态中自身攻击所造成的伤害提高。
暗血量谱

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>暗血<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>特性后，画面上会出现专用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>暗血量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>。
该量谱会显示暗血的具体量值。<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>血溅<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>和64级学会的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>寂灭<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>等技能都需要通过消耗积累的暗血量值才能发动。
暗血量值可以通过发动特定的技能进行积累。
暗黑量谱

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>至黑之夜<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能后，暗黑量谱会显示<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>暗技<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>状态。
消耗<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>至黑之夜<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>的防护罩效果可以附加暗技状态。
附加暗技状态后，可以通过只消耗暗技不消耗魔力的方式来发动<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>暗黑波动<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>和<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>暗黑锋<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能。
暗黑量谱

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>掠影示现<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能后，一同战斗的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>英雄的掠影<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>会变成实体。暗黑量谱可以显示英雄的掠影实体存在的剩余时间。
百合花茎量谱

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>神秘百合<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>特性后，画面上会出现专用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>百合花茎量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，
以显示当前<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>治疗百合<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>开花的数量。
当自身处于战斗状态时，每过一定时间就会开放一朵治疗百合，
消耗百合可以发动<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>安慰之心<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>和76级学会的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>狂喜之心<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能。
百合花茎量谱

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>安慰之心效果提高<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>特性后，百合花茎量谱会显示<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>血百合<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>的状态。使用需要消耗治疗百合的技能，可以使血百合逐渐开放。
当血百合完全开放时，即可发动<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>苦难之心<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能。
以太超流量谱

使用<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>以太超流<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能后，画面上会出现专用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>以太超流量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，以显示当前附加的以太超流量值。
异想量谱

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>以太契约<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能后，画面上会出现专用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>异想量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，以显示当前小仙女的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>异想以太<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>量值。在自身处于战斗状态且小仙女处于同行状态时，使用消耗以太超流的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>生命活性法<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>和<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>深谋远虑之策<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>等技能可以增加异想以太量值，积累的异想以太量值可以用来发动<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>以太契约<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能。
异想量谱

学会并使用<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>炽天召唤<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能后，可以暂时召唤出<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>炽天使<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>替代朝日小仙女。
异想量谱会显示炽天使的剩余存在时间。
奥秘量谱

发动<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>抽卡<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能后，画面上会出现专用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>奥秘量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，以显示当前抽出的卡片。使用抽出的卡片可以获得各种各样的效果，同时卡片效果会临时取代<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>出卡<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能。
奥秘量谱/星标

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>抽卡效果提高II<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>特性后，画面上会出现专用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>星标<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>。
在战斗状态下使用卡片技能，可以附加<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>日<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>、<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>月<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>、<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>星<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>三种标识中的一种。当标识附加到三个时，即可消耗标识发动<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>星力<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能。
疾风迅雷量谱

发动特定的战技时可以触发<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>疾风迅雷<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>状态。
学会能够触发该状态的技能后，画面上会出现<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>疾风迅雷量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，以显示当前疾风迅雷状态的剩余持续时间和量值。随着等级提升，量值在<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>红莲体势<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>和<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>金刚体势<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>下最多可以积累到三档，在<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>疾风体势<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>下最多可以积累到四档，疾风迅雷状态能够提升攻击速度与攻击所造成的伤害，积累的量值越多，提升的幅度越大。
斗气量谱

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>斗气<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能后，画面上会出现专用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>斗气量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，以显示当前的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>斗气<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>量值。
斗气量值累计到最大后，可以发动<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>铁山靠<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>和40级学会的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>空鸣拳<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能。
疾风迅雷量谱

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>无我<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能后，可以将<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>疾风迅雷<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>的持续时间暂时停止。
疾风迅雷持续时间停止时，表示时间的数值会不断闪烁。战斗状态下使用无我，会在无我持续生效的期间，一档一档连续附加疾风迅雷状态，直至最大档数。
龙血量谱

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>红莲龙血<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>特性后，画面上会出现用于表示<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>巨龙怒目<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>赋予状态的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>龙血量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>。
每次使用<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>幻象冲<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>都可以赋予一档<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>巨龙怒目<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>。
当巨龙怒目积攒到最大的二档时使用<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>武神枪<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>会自动发动<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>红莲龙血<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>。
红莲龙血状态下可以使用强力的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>死者之岸<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>和80级学会的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>坠星冲<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能。
龙血量谱

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>长枪精通IV<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>特性后，在每次使用<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>龙眼雷电<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>以及<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>龙眼苍穹<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>时都会赋予一档<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>天龙眼<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>。
当天龙眼积攒到最大档数时，可以发动<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>天龙点睛<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能。
风遁量谱

学会三种结印手势后即可发动<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>风遁之术<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>。
发动之后画面上会出现专用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>风遁量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，以显示风遁之术的剩余持续时间。
忍气量谱

学会<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>集气法<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>特性后，画面上会出现专用的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>忍气量谱<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>，以显示<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>忍气<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>量值的积累状况。忍气可以通过使用战技来进行积累，积累的忍气可以用来发动62级学会的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>通灵之术·大虾蟆<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>和68级学会的<UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>六道轮回<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>技能。
